verbose_text: As a vital member of the cationic antimicrobial peptides family, the particular mechanism by which CAMP inhibits proliferation and induces apoptosis is not known, but it has been assumed that CAMP could induce phosphatidylserine externalization and DNA fragmentation in a manner independent of caspase activation [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: CAMP inhibits proliferation and induces apoptosis
